title: Trash Ninja Bin Deodoriser (2 Pack) - Bin Freshener and Odour Eliminator Made with Activated Carbon, Bin Deodoriser and Freshener, Stick On Air Freshener for Bins, Unscented Bin Smell Eliminator
features: POWERFUL BIN FRESHENER AND ODOUR ELIMINATOR: Regular air fresheners won’t smother the stink, so get rid of it with our Trash Ninja Bin Deodorisers. Our bin smell eliminators absorb odour-causing moisture and chase the stink out of your trash bin.

FRESH AND LONG-LASTING: Our reusable bin odour eliminators are unscented, and each bin freshener lasts for up to three months. Stinky garbage? Foul food waste? Trash Ninja acts as a powerful bin scent freshener and zaps lingering scents away.

VERSATILE APPLICATIONS: Our bin deodoriser and freshener is perfect for standard household bins, but stink is not singular to the kitchen. Icky bathroom bins, smelly laundry hampers, and reeking nappy bins can all be saved with Trash Ninja.

ACTIVATED CARBON TECHNOLOGY: While many traditional bin refreshers rely on only fragrance to mask scents, we’ve turned to activated carbon felt. It attracts and absorbs odour-causing molecules and moisture, so your bins stay fresh.

SIMPLE AND EASY TO USE: Our stick-on bin scent fresheners attach to the lid of your trash bin. Install the bin odour eliminator with the hinges pointing down. These last up to three months and should be recharged monthly in the sun for 2-4 hours.
description: Product Description Check out these other deodorisers from Ellis Harper! Previous page Next page Check out these other deodorisers! Trash Ninja Add To Basket Trash Ninja Scented Buying Options Shoe Ninja Scented Add To Basket Fridge Ninja Add To Basket Customer Reviews 2.9 out of 5 stars 436 2.9 out of 5 stars 436 4.0 out of 5 stars 2,600 4.2 out of 5 stars 9,470 Price £9.99 £ 9 . 99 — £9.99 £ 9 . 99 £9.99 £ 9 . 99 Filter Type Activated Carbon Felt Activated Charcoal Activated Charcoal Activated Charcoal Recommended Application Bins Shoes Shoes Fridges Lasts For Three Months Three Months Three Months One Year Rechargeable ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Versatile Uses ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Scented ✘ ✔ ✔ ✘ Do these come charged and how do I recharge these bin deodorisers? Yes, our bin fresheners are ready to use. To recharge, simply set our bin odour eliminators out in the direct sun for 2-4 hours every month to keep them working at their best. How long does the bin air freshener work before it needs replacing? Our bin smell eliminators are good for up to three months. Can I use these bin odour eliminators for something other than my trash bin? Yes. Thanks to the adhesive backing, you can apply it to the lid of nappy pails, laundry hampers, and more. Will this bin scent freshener work on a curved lid? Yes. The product will stick on any curved or flat lid and works best with a standard-size garbage bin. bin deodoriser is falling into my bin when I open it. How can I stop this? Make sure when you stick the product onto your bin that you apply the bin odour eliminator with the hinges facing downward toward the hinges of your bin lid. That will keep it from falling into the bin when you open it.
